name: Paneer 65
description: Paneer cubes marinated in South Indian spices and fried until crispy, offering a flavorful, tangy taste.

name: Veg Manchurian
description: Vegetable dumplings tossed in a spicy, tangy Manchurian sauce with bell peppers and onions.

name: Chilli Paneer
description: Paneer cubes stir-fried in a spicy chili sauce with bell peppers and onions, perfect for spice lovers.

name: Chilli Mushroom
description: Fresh mushrooms tossed in a spicy chili sauce with peppers and onions, giving a rich, savory flavor.

name: Baby Corn Manchurian
description: Crispy baby corn pieces in a tangy Manchurian sauce, topped with spring onions and peppers.

name: Crispy Corn
description: Sweet corn kernels coated in a light batter and fried to a golden crisp, served with a sprinkle of spices.
